void CnetHttp::queueChanged (  )  [inline]

//////////////// PUBLIC INTERFACE FOR NETWORK CONNECTIONS these are called via io_service posts.

We receive this when the queue is changed and we are (probably) waiting for a message. I say PROBABLY, because the client could have changed its mind in the meanwhile.
